problems.title: Two Sum
problems.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

problems.title: Watermelon
problems.description: Determine if a given weight of watermelon can be divided into two parts, each weighing an even number of kilos.

problems.title: Weird Algorithm
problems.description: Consider an algorithm that takes a positive integer n. If n is even, divide it by 2; if n is odd, multiply it by 3 and add 1. Repeat until n becomes 1.

problems.title: Merge Sort
problems.description: Implement merge sort algorithm to sort an array of integers in ascending order.

problems.title: Trailing Zeroes
problems.description: Count the number of trailing zeroes in the factorial of a given number.

problems.title: Valid Parentheses
problems.description: Given a string s containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid.

problems.title: Theatre Square
problems.description: Calculate the minimum number of square marble tiles needed to cover a rectangular theatre square.

problems.title: Missing Number
problems.description: Find the missing number in an array containing n-1 integers in the range 1 to n.

problems.title: Kadane's Algorithm
problems.description: Find the maximum sum of a contiguous subarray within a one-dimensional array of numbers.

problems.title: Binary Simulation
problems.description: Simulate operations on a binary string including flipping bits and querying the value at a specific position.

problems.title: Add Two Numbers
problems.description: Add two numbers represented by two linked lists where each node contains a single digit.

problems.title: Way Too Long Words
problems.description: Abbreviate words that are too long by writing the first and last letter with the number of letters between them.

problems.title: Repetitions
problems.description: Find the longest repetition in a DNA sequence (a string consisting of characters A, C, G, and T).

problems.title: Subset Sum Problem
problems.description: Determine if there is a subset of the given set with a sum equal to a given sum.

problems.title: Opposite Task
problems.description: Distribute n problems between two computers such that neither gets more than 10 problems.

problems.title: LRU Cache
problems.description: Design and implement a data structure for Least Recently Used (LRU) cache.

problems.title: Beautiful Matrix
problems.description: Calculate the minimum number of moves needed to make the matrix beautiful by moving the 1 to the center position.

problems.title: Increasing Array
problems.description: Find the minimum number of moves required to make an array strictly increasing.

problems.title: N-Queen Problem
problems.description: Place N queens on an N×N chessboard so that no two queens threaten each other.

problems.title: Discovering Paths
problems.description: Find the number of paths from the top-left corner to the bottom-right corner of a grid.

problems.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
problems.description: Find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

problems.title: Petya and Strings
problems.description: Compare two strings lexicographically, ignoring case.

problems.title: Permutations
problems.description: Construct a permutation of numbers 1,2,…,n such that there are no adjacent elements whose difference is 1.

problems.title: 0-1 Knapsack Problem
problems.description: Select items to maximize value while keeping the total weight under capacity.

problems.title: Hex-a-bonacci
problems.description: Calculate the nth term of the Hex-a-bonacci sequence using dynamic programming.

problems.title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
problems.description: Find the median of the two sorted arrays in logarithmic time complexity.

problems.title: Bit++
problems.description: Track the value of a variable after a sequence of increment and decrement operations.

problems.title: Number Spiral
problems.description: Find the number at position (y,x) in an infinite spiral of numbers.

problems.title: Minimum Platforms
problems.description: Find the minimum number of platforms required for a railway station so that no train is kept waiting.

problems.title: How Cow
problems.description: Determine if a cow is inside a rectangular fence.

problems.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
problems.description: Find the longest palindromic substring in a given string.

problems.title: Team
problems.description: Count the number of problems a team will solve based on their confidence levels.

problems.title: Two Knights
problems.description: Count the number of ways to place two knights on an n×n chessboard so that they don't attack each other.

problems.title: Egg Dropping Puzzle
problems.description: Determine the minimum number of attempts needed to find the critical floor in the worst case.

problems.title: Counting Triangles
problems.description: Count the number of triangles that can be formed with sides of specific lengths.

problems.title: Zigzag Conversion
problems.description: Convert a string to a zigzag pattern and then read it line by line.

problems.title: Domino Piling
problems.description: Calculate the maximum number of dominoes that can fit on a rectangular board.

problems.title: Two Sets
problems.description: Divide numbers 1,2,…,n into two sets of equal sum.

problems.title: Coin Change
problems.description: Find the number of ways to make change for a given amount using a set of coins.

problems.title: Brushes
problems.description: Calculate the minimum number of brushes needed to paint a given number of regions.

problems.title: String to Integer (atoi)
problems.description: Implement the myAtoi(string s) function, which converts a string to a 32-bit signed integer.

problems.title: Next Round
problems.description: Determine how many contestants advance to the next round based on their scores.

problems.title: Bit Strings
problems.description: Calculate the number of bit strings of length n modulo 10^9+7.

problems.title: Fractional Knapsack
problems.description: Maximize value of items put in a knapsack where items can be broken into smaller pieces.

problems.title: Palindrome Numbers
problems.description: Determine if a number is palindromic in both decimal and binary representations.

problems.title: Palindrome Number
problems.description: Determine whether an integer is a palindrome without converting it to a string.

problems.title: String Task
problems.description: Transform a string by removing vowels and prefixing consonants with a period.

problems.title: Trailing Zeros
problems.description: Calculate the number of trailing zeros in the factorial of n.

problems.title: Job Sequencing Problem
problems.description: Find the maximum profit by sequencing jobs with deadlines to maximize profit.

problems.title: Nusrat's Treat
problems.description: Calculate the sum of the first n natural numbers.

problems.title: Regular Expression Matching
problems.description: Implement regular expression matching with support for '.' and '*'.

problems.title: Helpful Maths
problems.description: Rearrange the terms in the sum to make it easier to calculate.

problems.title: Coin Combinations I
problems.description: Count the number of ways to produce a sum using a set of coins.

problems.title: Longest Common Subsequence
problems.description: Find the length of the longest subsequence present in both of the given sequences.

problems.title: Wavio Sequence
problems.description: Find the longest wavio sequence in an array of integers.

problems.title: Container With Most Water
problems.description: Find two lines that together with the x-axis form a container that holds the most water.

problems.title: Stones on the Table
problems.description: Count the minimum number of stones to take from the table so that any two neighboring stones have different colors.

problems.title: Coin Combinations II
problems.description: Count the ordered ways to produce a sum using a set of coins.

problems.title: Edit Distance
problems.description: Find the minimum number of operations required to convert one string to another.

problems.title: Curious Robin Hood
problems.description: Perform operations on an array including updates and range sum queries.

problems.title: Integer to Roman
problems.description: Convert an integer to a roman numeral.

problems.title: Boy or Girl
problems.description: Determine if a username belongs to a boy or a girl based on the number of distinct characters.

problems.title: Removing Digits
problems.description: Find the minimum number of operations to reduce a number to zero by subtracting one of its digits at a time.

problems.title: Maximum Subarray Sum
problems.description: Find the sum of the contiguous subarray with the maximum sum.

problems.title: Goldbach's Conjecture
problems.description: Express an even number as the sum of two prime numbers.

problems.title: 3Sum
problems.description: Find all unique triplets in the array which gives the sum of zero.

problems.title: Word Capitalization
problems.description: Capitalize the first letter of a word.

problems.title: Grid Paths
problems.description: Count the number of paths from the top-left square to the bottom-right square in a grid.

problems.title: Activity Selection
problems.description: Select the maximum number of activities that can be performed by a single person.

problems.title: Pairs Forming LCM
problems.description: Count the number of pairs whose LCM equals a given number.

problems.title: Letter Combinations of a Phone Number
problems.description: Return all possible letter combinations that the number could represent on a phone keypad.

problems.title: Bear and Big Brother
problems.description: Determine how many years it will take for Limak to become strictly larger than Bob.

problems.title: Book Shop
problems.description: Maximize the number of pages to read given a budget constraint.

problems.title: Dijkstra's Algorithm
problems.description: Implement Dijkstra's algorithm to find the shortest path from a source vertex to all other vertices.

problems.title: Area of a Parallelogram
problems.description: Calculate the area of a parallelogram given its vertices.

problems.title: Find Peak Element
problems.description: Find a peak element in an array and return its index.

problems.title: Sum of Digits
problems.description: Given a number, repeatedly sum its digits until a single digit remains.

problems.description: Solve a sample LightOJ problem.
